thread.title: Photo: Look Who Priyanka Chopra Hung Out With At The Oscars Yesterday
thread.title_full: Photo: Look Who Priyanka Chopra Hung Out With At The Oscars Yesterday

author: Divya Rao
title: Photo: Look Who Priyanka Chopra Hung Out With At The Oscars Yesterday
text:
Divya Rao Feb . 28 . 2017 
Priyanka Chopra was at the Oscars yesterday and looked breathtakingly beautiful in her Ralph and Russo gown. She even did shots like a boss with Jennifer Anniston and Chrissy Teigen , and made us wish we could have her life! We found this picture of her hanging out backstage with India’s first Oscar nominee Dev Patel , and it brought a smile to our faces because these two desis are making us proud! 
Take a look. A post shared by اولین مرجع اخبار پارسی بالیوود (@bolly_newspaper) on Feb 27, 2017 at 1:40pm PST 
Nice!
